description: A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued by an animist to burst in a flash of light.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued by an animist to leech mana from its targets.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been coated by a biomancer's own acid.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.

A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued has had a black hole woven into it by a Magus and will unleash it on hit. It is unstable, and the black hole will randomly appear next to an enemy, not always the one it hits.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued with raw magic from a Magus to pierce armor.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
A 84x246mm High Explosive anti-personnel round for the Carl Gustav M3 recoilless rifle. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
